command 401: and fear Jikan as their heartless tyrant.

command 401: was not lost forever. It was a burning
command 401: soul that refused to be extinguished,
command 401: and it would not see its people suffer.
command 101: Their tempority worked to protect the
command 401: people of time, who were most grateful
command 401: for the lost soul.
command 401: Soon, it became a life of its own
command 101: and took its own name:
command 401: 'Oren.
command 101: Yet even with this new savior,
command 401: one fateful day the planet itself
command 401: was ripped asunder by Jikan's wrath.
command 101: The people's suffering was unbearable.
command 401: All was lost.
command 401: Yet surely, there was still something
command 401: that could be done...
command 101: The temporics decided to send their
command 401: children beyond the stars to a new world,
command 401: one free from conflict and with a bright future.
command 101: 'Oren remained to lead the adults in a
command 401: grand conflict against Jikan. All knew
command 401: it was a futile effort, but still
command 401: they fought.

command 401: for their children,
command 401: for their future.
command 101: The children of time soared away in a
command 401: massive ship, protected from Time's Wrath
command 401: by the hopes of those who fought below.

command 401: Perhaps, even now, their battle rages on...

command 401: are to be seen on the bottom.

command 401: of that, but may still have something else covering it.

command 401: covering the middle layer tiles.

command 401: those ones.

command 401: their appearence.

command 401: in the tileset.

command 401: given a * star rating, which will determine its priority.
